name: Up, Right, Down, Left
description:
Left Mouse-Click to move your square in a new direction. You move in the following order: Up, Right, Down, Left, repeat. However, you only get one tap/mouse click per room - and you must exit each new room in that order: UP, RIGHT, DOWN, LEFT, repeat! 

HINT: There is only one correct exit per room.

Your speed increases after every room for increased challenge, however is capped after a certain amount.

Note: Mobile scaling is screwed up. Need to figure it out.. If you try the game on mobile, please let me know how the screen looks and which device you are on!

Made with GM: Studio 2.3
